title: Permanently suspended but I haven't played a game on the account for 20 days?
body:
As the title says my main account (Slephnyr) has not been played in 20 days as seen by my op.gg but it says that I've been permanently suspended. (http://imgur.com/a/Y0qRM)
https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=slephnyr

I have never gotten so much as a suspension in my 5+ years of playing so I'm not sure why I got banned. 

After checking my account and trying to change my password it says my email is ***ka@sohu.com which I have no idea where that's from. As I use a gmail account. 

I can't change my email/access the email that explains my behaviour so any information as to how I should get my account back would be great. 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Looks like your account got hijacked. 
Contact support via support.riotgames.com you will need to prove you own the account but they should be able to return it and unban it. It most likely was banned because they detected the compromise.
